content: Fall fun begins in our city of multitudes
Fall in Pittsburgh means can‚Äôt-miss festivals, world-class haunted attractions and seas of black and gold rooting on the Steelers.

Temps may be cooling off, but the reasons to visit Pittsburgh just keep heating up thisfall. In September, we get things started with a jam-packedLabor Day weekendof fun then celebrate culture with thePittsburgh Irish Festival,Pittsburgh Soul Food Festival,The Original Pittsburgh Taco Festivaland Pittsburgh Chinese Cultural Festival.

Get your Terrible Towels ready, because theSteelersofficially kick off their NFL season this month atAcrisure Stadium. Plus, this month is the return of theBackyard Brawlas Pitt takes on rival WVU and the Pirates,Riverhoundsand evenPenguinsare in action.

School is officially back in session for college students in the city. We're here to help withBURGH101, a free digital pass that lets students and their families save big at 60 spots to do more during their off campus journeys.
